actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Japanese-Americans who were placed in internment camps during World War II shall be credited for civil service retirement purposes with the time they spent in such camps.

summary.text: Provides that Japanese-Americans who were placed in internment camps during World War II shall be credited for civil service retirement purposes with the time they spent in such camps. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 8332(l)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Japanese-Americans who were placed in internment camps during World War II shall be credited for civil service retirement purposes with the time they spent in such camps.
